attributes.action: Call for a public investigation into how much influence big pharma and tobacco companies have on UK and EU policy and laws
attributes.additional_details: Big pharma and the tobacco companies have far too much power and sway over both UK and EU policy and laws. the under hand methods and possibly illegal actions of these companies and their lobby groups need to be openly investigated. our MP's need to be reminded that although they may be shareholders of these companies their 1st priority lays with the voters of the UK and not their own pockets
